duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Oracle Access Management for SaaS, PaaS, and Warehouse Management System apps.
Authenticate Middleware and SaaS applications and manage application security roles and user access.
Provision and deprovision user roles and data access, and configure application services and SSO.
Customize applications and page layouts, and manage BI and OTBI security.
Administer RMC and user access requests, and oversee access prevention administration.
Federate access between SaaS and PaaS, and manage Oracle Risk Management Cloud operations.
